app.hoplr.agree_to_holpr_tos: I agree to the Hoplr Terms and Privacy policy
app.hoplr.confirm_logout: Are you sure you want to log out of Hoplr? You'll need to sign in again when you want to view the feed from Hoplr.
app.hoplr.invitation_code_info: For the safety and privacy of your neighbourhood, we ask everyone to verify their address with a unique verification code. If you did not receive an invitation code for Hoplr, you can skip this step, but until you've been accepted by one of the ambassadors of the neighbourhood you won't be able to use all functions.
app.hoplr.message_visible_in_x_neighbourhoods: This message and its reactions are visible in {{ amount }} neighbourhoods
app.hoplr.no_neighbourhood_found_for_your_address: Unfortunately, Hoplr is not active yet in your neighbourhood. Visit https://www.hoplr.com/start-your-neighbourhood to request a neighbourhood network.
app.hoplr.password_length_error: Your password must be at least {{ amount }} characters long
app.hoplr.step_address_description:
We will search your neighbourhood right away!
 Please enter your street name, number and city or municipality.
app.hoplr.survey_expired_message: It is unfortunately no longer possible to fill in the survey because it has been closed at {{ date }}.
app.hoplr.unknown_error: An unknown error has occurred. Please retry later and verify if your internet connection is working properly.
app.hoplr.visible_for_external_businesses_info:
* External parties have no further insight into this neighborhood
* External parties can respond and read responses to this message
app.hoplr.visible_for_local_business_info:
* Local authorities, utilities or temporary contractors in the neighbourhood can use Hoplr to inform residents in a neighbourhood-oriented manner, to involve them in a project or to keep them informed of nuisance and nuisance.
* External parties are not members of the neighbourhood and only have access to their own messages.
* Reports from external parties may not contain commercial messages. You can also turn off reports from external parties via settings.
* This way we keep Hoplr free and ad-free.
app.hoplr.you_must_agree_to_the_tos: You must agree to the terms of use and privacy policy before continuing
app.hoplr.your_neighbourhood_info: We have found this neighbourhood based on your address.
